vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Ephraim living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Num.26.35;
son of: Ephraim (H0669);
brother of: Shuthelah (H7803), Tahan (H8465), Ezer (H5827), Elead (H0496) and Beriah (H1283H)
Group of be.kher (בֶּ֫כֶר "Becher" H1071H)
§ Bachrites = "a dromedary: first-born"
one of the family of Becher
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Béquer; tribu de Efraín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
比結 - "單峰駱駝: 頭胎"
1) 比結的家人之一(民 26:35)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
比结 - "单峰骆驼: 头胎"
1) 比结的家人之一(民 26:35)
